document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the genus Bioramix Bates, 1879 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Platyscelidini) from China

Distribution. China : Gansu ( new record ), Qinghai ( Egorov, 2019 ), Sichuan ( new record ), Xizang ( Kaszab, 1940 ; Egorov, 2008 ).

Remarks. The type locality of
Bioramix reinigi
is unable to confirm, type locality of
Platynoscelis tibetana
may be Bayan Ka La Shan, southwest of Madoi County, Qinghai , China . Based on the examination of 1500 specimens (including 2 of 6 type ones), material from Madoi County [QMD] distinctly different from Gansu [GMQ, GLG], Sichuan [SRX, SDG, SDM], Qinghai [QZH, QGH, QBM, QCX, QCC] by male aedeagus, and also Qinghai [QMX] by body size and metallic sheen of elytral surface. However, material between them presenting continuous variation. Furthermore, male aedeagus can also be varied in the same locality [QMH, QDQ, QMQ]. Therefore, we regarded all the material as
B. reinigi
at present morphological study.
